title: Agitation

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone at night. You will learn their exact role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the day, if all players don't speak for three hours or more, immediately investigate the first player to break the silence. The investigation is random from the following:
> (6) Investicreator
> (35) Investigator
> (37) Investiletter
> (948) Sheriff
> (1776) Crayon Kid
> (1802) ToL Princess
> (1934) The Sniffer [Plants are only for investigative purposes]
- You may only investigate two people each day.
- You may only use your ability at night if your first attribute did not trigger the previous day.
